issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
When testing KS, Phone>Sound>Remote streaming, no sound was produced. Logcat reports issues while initializing. See attached .txt file for log data.

This did not occur on the same KS built with 1.7.1 or 1.7.0.

Step to reproduce:
1) build KS with 1.7.2
2) Install on android device
3) Navigate to Phone>Sound>Remote streaming
4) Tap "Start Streaming"

Result:
No sound, log output indicating problems initializing

Expected:
Sound playback with no problems
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Phone>Sound>Remote streaming, no sound produced on Nexus S with 1.7.2
fields.environment: Nexus S 2.3.4,  Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.1.201106171427, SDK 1_7_X ra8dd437a
